entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 late this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
